CustomField.formula: IF (OR(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Signatures"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Authoring")), IF(OR($User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4d', $User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4t', $User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4u'), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__LightningSendEmailWizard?id="&Id & "&action=Send_To_Other_Party_For_Review", IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_SendForReview", "Send For Review"), "_self"), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__SendEmail?id="&Id & "&action=Send_To_Other_Party_For_Review", IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_SendForReview", "Send For Review"), "_self")), NULL)
CustomField.label: Send For Internal Review
